app.title: EPCalculator v2 - Kalkulator Probabilitas Kesalahan
app.tagline: Kalkulator Probabilitas Kesalahan kanggo Sistem Transmisi Digital

params.title: Parameter Simulasi
params.customConstellationHelp: Definisikake titik konstelasi dhewe kanthi probabilitas khusus
params.fixErrors: Tulung benakake kesalahan ing ndhuwur sadurunge ngitung.

results.title: Asil Simulasi
results.computingHint: Iki bisa mbutuhake sawetara wektu gumantung parameter
results.errorProbabilityDesc: Probabilitas simbol sing ditransmisi salah ditampa
results.errorExponentDesc: Tingkat peluruhan eksponensial probabilitas kesalahan kanthi dawa kode
results.optimalRhoDesc: Nilai parameter optimal saka proses optimisasi
results.computationTimeDesc: Wektu sing dibutuhake kanggo ngitung asil
results.noResultsHint: Konfigurasi parameter simulasi lan klik "Itung Probabilitas Kesalahan" kanggo ndeleng asil ing kene.
results.optimizationValue: Penurunan gradien kanthi ukuran langkah adaptif

simulation.title: Simulasi Probabilitas Kesalahan
simulation.description: Konfigurasi parameter modulasi lan itung wates probabilitas kesalahan nggunakake analisis teori informasi.

plottingPanel.title: Grafik Interaktif
plottingPanel.description: Gawe grafik interaktif kanggo visualisasi prilaku probabilitas kesalahan ing rentang parameter sing beda.
plottingPanel.generatingHint: Ngitung titik data lan nggambar visualisasi
plottingPanel.noPlotsHint: Konfigurasi parameter grafik lan simulasi, banjur klik "Gawe Grafik" kanggo nggawe visualisasi.

plotting.title: Kontrol Grafik
plotting.mbNotAvailable: MB ora kasedhiya nalika β ing sumbu X
plotting.mbDescription: Distribusi Maxwell-Boltzmann: Q(x) ∝ exp(-β|x|²). Nilai β sing luwih dhuwur nglumpukake probabilitas ing simbol energi rendah (pembentukan amplitudo probabilistik).
plotting.affectsDistribution: Pengaruhi distribusi titik lan unit rentang
plotting.fixErrors: Tulung benakake kesalahan ing ndhuwur sadurunge nggawe grafik.
plotting.importHelp: Unggah, ketik manual, utawa tempel data saka Python, MATLAB, Excel, lsp.
plotting.mergeOrNewDescription: Plot karo sumbu sing padha wis ana. Sampeyan pengin nggabungake data anyar utawa nggawe gambar kapisah?

constellation.title: Konstelasi Khusus
constellation.normalizeTooltip: Klik kanggo normalisasi konstelasi (probabilitas jumlah 1, energi rata-rata = 1)
constellation.vizCaption: Seret titik kanggo mindhah. Arahake kanggo ndeleng koordinat. Bunder berwarna nuduhake energi rata-rata saiki.

dataImport.title: Impor Data
dataImport.dragDrop: Seret lan selehake file ing kene, utawa klik kanggo milih

validation.qamPerfectSquare: QAM mbutuhake M dadi kuadrat sempurna (4, 16, 64, 256)
validation.customConstellationInvalid: Konstelasi khusus ora sah (priksa jumlah probabilitas lan energi)
validation.xRangeInvalid: Rentang X kudu duwe rong nilai kanthi min < maks
validation.x2RangeInvalid: Rentang X2 kudu duwe rong nilai kanthi min < maks

plotItem.incompatibleAxes: Grafik sing dipilih duwe sumbu sing ora kompatibel (X1 lan X2 kudu cocog)
plotItem.allAxesMustMatch: Kabeh grafik sing dipilih kudu duwe sumbu sing cocog (X1, X2, lan Z)
plotItem.incompatibleWithSelected: Sumbu ora kompatibel karo grafik sing dipilih

footer.title: EPCalculator v2
footer.description: Implementasi modern itungan probabilitas kesalahan kanggo sistem transmisi digital.
footer.copyright: EPCalculator. Dibangun kanthi teknologi web modern.

tutorial.welcomeSubtitle: Error Probability Calculator for Digital Communications
tutorial.singlePointDesc: Compute error probability for specific parameter values. Set modulation, SNR, and code rate to get instant results.
tutorial.plottingDesc: Generate interactive plots to explore how error probability changes across parameter ranges. Compare different configurations visually.
tutorial.pressEscHint: Press Enter or Esc to continue
tutorial.stepAxisScalesDesc: Each axis can be Linear or Logarithmic. For SNR axes, toggle between dB and linear units. The button shows the state it will switch to when clicked.
tutorial.stepTransposeDesc: Swap the X and Y axes to view the data from a different perspective.
tutorial.stepExportDesc: Export your plot as PNG, SVG for images, or CSV for raw data analysis.
tutorial.stepRemoveDesc: Remove this plot from your workspace. You can always generate it again.
tutorial.stepContourComparisonDesc: Select multiple contour plots using the checkboxes to compare them. Use Comparison to show differences between two plots, or Benchmark to overlay multiple 3D surfaces.
tutorial.stepConstellationDesc: Drag points to move them. Hover to see coordinates.
tutorial.stepConstellationTableDesc: Edit point coordinates and probabilities precisely.
tutorial.stepConstellationLuckyDesc: Generate a random constellation with 2-16 points. The constellation is automatically normalized to have unit energy and probabilities summing to 1.
tutorial.stepConstellationHideTableDesc: Show or hide the points table to focus on the visual editor or get more precise control over point values.
